mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, content, author) VALUES (#{postId}, #{content}, #{author})
mapper.select: SELECT a.* , b.nickname, b.image FROM comments a, users b WHERE a.author = b.userid and a.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY a.SELECTION DESC
SELECT id, post_id, content, author, selection, created_time, modified_time FROM comments WHERE author = #{userid} ORDER BY modified_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET selection = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET point = point + 300 WHERE userid = (select author from comments where id = #{id})
